games.summary: With the Wizards having only eight players available, the Nets led by 34 points in the second quarter and went on to snap a three-game losing streak. Will Riley scored a career-high 27 points for the Wizards.
blurbs: 📋 Tristan Vukcevic (WSH) made just his 3rd start this season. 14 pts, 2 reb.
📋 Jamir Watkins (WSH) made just his 3rd start this season. 13 pts, 1 reb.
📋 Will Riley (WSH) made just his 2nd start this season. 27 pts, 3 reb.
⬆️ Anthony Gill (WSH) played 28 min (season avg: 7). 9 pts, 5 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: Tari Eason scored a season-high 26 points, and the Houston Rockets beat the short-handed Oklahoma City Thunder 112-106 on Saturday. Alperen Sengun had 17 points, 12 rebounds and 11 assists for his second triple-double of the season and No.
blurbs: ⬆️ JD Davison (HOU) played 18 min (season avg: 7). 8 pts, 4 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: San Antonio guard Stephon Castle had a career-high 40 points, 12 rebounds and 12 assists for his second career triple-double, leading the Spurs past the Dallas Mavericks 138-125 on Saturday. Devin Vassell had 17 points and Victor Wembanyama added 16 points and 11 rebounds for San Antonio, which set a season high for points in a half with 81 before halftime.
blurbs: ⬆️ Caleb Martin (DAL) played 24 min (season avg: 14). 11 pts, 5 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: ORLANDO, Fla, -- — Paolo Banchero had 23 points and the Orlando Magic overcame a 17-point deficit to beat the Utah Jazz 120-117 on Saturday night. had 17 of his 22 points in the first half in his Utah debut, and Isaiah Collier scored 20 points.

Miles Bridges scored 26 points, Kon Knueppel had 23 and the Charlotte Hornets beat the Atlanta Hawks 126-119 on Saturday night for their ninth straight win. Brandon Miller scored 16 points, and Moussa Diabate finished with 11 points and 15 rebounds.

Nikola Jokic had 22 points, 17 assists and 14 rebounds to pass Oscar Robertson for the second-most triple-doubles in NBA history and the Denver Nuggets ended a three-game skid with a 136-120 victory over the Chicago Bulls on Saturday night. Matas Buzelis scored 21 points and Collin Sexton added 17 for the Bulls, who have lost four straight.
blurbs: 🆕 Guerschon Yabusele (CHI) made his first start of the season. 26 min, 12 pts.
📋 Anfernee Simons (CHI) made just his 2nd start this season. 15 pts, 4 reb.
📋 Jaden Ivey (CHI) made just his 4th start this season. 10 pts, 6 reb.
⬆️ Rob Dillingham (CHI) played 22 min (season avg: 9). 9 pts, 3 reb, 4 ast.
📋 Julian Strawther (DEN) made just his 2nd start this season. 19 pts, 5 reb.

games.summary: LeBron James had 20 points, 10 assists and seven rebounds to help the Los Angeles Lakers beat the Golden Stats Warriors 105-99 on Saturday night. Luke Kennard had 10 points in his Lakers debut after being acquired in a trade from Atlanta on Thursday, including a key corner 3-pointer and finding Jarred Vanderbilt underneath the basket for a dunk as part of a late 11-0 run.
blurbs: 📋 Jaxson Hayes (LAL) made just his 5th start this season. 6 pts, 4 reb.
⬆️ Maxi Kleber (LAL) played 28 min (season avg: 11). 5 pts, 7 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: Joel Embiid scored 33 points, Tyrese Maxey added 29 and the Philadelphia 76ers beat the cold-shooting Phoenix Suns 109-103 on Saturday night. Brooks led the Suns with 28 points.
blurbs: ⬆️ Trendon Watford (PHI) played 27 min (season avg: 16). 6 pts, 7 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: PORTLAND, Ore. Jrue Holiday had 21 points and Caleb Love scored 17 points, 10 in the second half, off the bench.

games.summary: SACRAMENTO, Calif. -- — James Harden scored 23 points in his Cavaliers debut and Donovan Mitchell had 35, including a free throw that sealed the win with 35 seconds remaining, in Cleveland's 132-126 victory over Sacramento on Saturday night that sent the Kings to their 12th straight loss.
blurbs: ⬆️ Nique Clifford (SAC) played 40 min (season avg: 20). 30 pts, 4 reb, 4 ast.
